name: C A S S E T T E . n e s
name_original: C A S S E T T E . n e s
description:
C A S S E T T E . n e s

Made in the summer of 2022 to learn some NES game dev practices. Built with 6502 assembly and NESASM.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • A: Change cassette colour palette

Music: computers-are-easy by hxlnt, whose source code has helped me out a ton in learning this stuff.
